meanings.definition: A man who has lost his spouse through death.
meanings.sent1: After his wife passed away, he became a widower.
meanings.sent2: The widower missed his wife dearly.
meanings.sent3: The widower joked that he was now the king of his castle.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a widower, empty and longing.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lonely widower sitting by the window stuck in her mind.
